name: Blast Voyage
description:
Have a blast and set sail on a pirate puzzle adventure across the universe!

Meet Joey – a brave, young girl about to embark on a daring voyage around the world with nothing but a floating bucket, a backpack, and YOU! Help Joey on her quest by playing color-matching puzzle games blasting with excitement.

Prepare to Blast – Blast gems of the same color, collect coins, and help Joey on her voyage across the universe!

Colorful Blastin’ Features!
- Collect coins to fill Joey’s bucket after blasting matching colors.
- Claim a free bonus every day.
- Use explosive boosters and epic powerups when things get tricky.
- Fill Joey’s backpack with blasting bombs, cannons, and more! Blast Voyage is taking match 3 and blast game booster to another level!

Reach an exciting new world as you progress
Walk like an Egyptian on the pyramids of Egypt, put on your hiking boots, and travel to the Lantern Mountains.
- Blast away gems and advance through every fun puzzle!
- New puzzle worlds as you progress.
- Hundreds of blast game levels so the fun never stops!



If you love match 3, puzzle, and blast games, prepare for the most epic puzzle game adventure you've ever experienced. Hop on board with Joey - Download Blast Voyage today!
